com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing

Class IndexTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing.IndexTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseTransaction, LoggableTransaction

    public class IndexTransaction
extends Object
implements BaseTransaction, LoggableTransaction
    Wraps the transaction handle of an index and buffers all mutations against an index for efficiency. Also acts as a proxy to the IndexProvider methods.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
